rows.label: tev075501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Erio about her role in BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Erio about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0001
rows.name:
I lived in New LA posing as a Mediator named
Suriella.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0002
rows.name:
When the city was still in the throes of its energy
shortage, we helped each other—and at times fought
with each other—as we built the city piece by piece.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0003
rows.name:
As someone who had lived her life lying for Ganglion
and betraying everyone around her, it was a dazzling
and utterly inconceivable experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0004
rows.name: I can no longer work as a BLADE the way I did then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0005
rows.name:
But the desire that I felt as a BLADE to protect the
people of New LA? That remains within me still.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0008
rows.name:
I have continued to research the data from Fortu...
From my mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0009
rows.name:
Apparently this tiny orb contains all of the information
in the universe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Merely locating the information about Definians will
likely prove quite time-consuming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0011
rows.name:
But I intend to find the key to stopping the trouble
that my sisters are causing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0012
rows.name:
And when that day comes, I'll be counting on your
support. With you at my side, I know that I can stand
up against even my own sisters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Erio about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0017
rows.name:
What have you done to me? Whenever I look at you,
my heart...aches.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0018
rows.name:
What could it mean? I tried asking Lyvia,
but she merely smirked at me and said nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0019
rows.name: What am I supposed to do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_SEL4021
rows.name: Ask Erio about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0020
rows.name:
What have you done to me? Whenever I look at you,
my heart...aches.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0021
rows.name:
What could it mean? I tried asking Lyvia,
but she merely smirked at me and said nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0022
rows.name: What am I supposed to do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_SEL5011
rows.name: Ask Erio about xenoforms living in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_SEL5021
rows.name: Ask Erio about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0023
rows.name:
It seems that even beings from other worlds intend
to put their faith in humanity and work together to
carve out a life here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0024
rows.name:
Just like Lyvia, who is living and working hand in hand
with the humans of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0025
rows.name:
As a spy, I have infiltrated numerous planets,
yet I've never seen a city like New LA before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0026
rows.name:
I don't know if it's some strange fluke or just the power
of you humans to forge bonds with others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0027
rows.name:
But I also wish to live on in New LA as Lyvia does.
I hope that you'll have me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0031
rows.name:
Thank you for assisting me again in that situation with
my mother. I feel guilty for asking so much of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0032
rows.name:
Incidentally, have you been to see her recently?
If not, you should use a Skell to fly to the top of
BLADE Tower.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0033
rows.name:
I imagine she must be quite lonely up there by herself.
I'm sure she would enjoy having a visitor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0034
rows.name:
...Hmm? What did I do to her? Heh heh.
Oh, it was just my small way of punishing her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev075501_MSG0035
rows.name:
Hopefully Her Majesty will take the opportunity to reflect
upon her misdeeds...[ST:wait ]
